subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXNPWLOX
WWUS76 KLOX 290951
NPWLOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
251 AM PDT SUN APR 29 2007

..AREAS OF DENSE FOG CONTINUES ALONG THE CENTRAL COAST THIS
MORNING...

A THIN MARINE LAYER WITHIN A THIN LAYER WILL CONTINUE TO
PRODUCE AREAS OF DENSE FOG ALONG THE CENTRAL COAST THROUGH MID
MORNING.

CAZ041-291100-
/O.EXP.KLOX.FG.Y.0009.000000T0000Z-070429T1000Z/
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
251 AM PDT SUN APR 29 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ALLOWED THE
DENSE FOG ADVISORY FOR THE LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST TO EXPIRE. LOCAL
DENSE FOG COULD STILL DEVELOP THIS MORNING AS THE MARINE LAYER
DEPTH INCREASES.

$$

CAZ040-291100-
/O.EXP.KLOX.FG.Y.0009.000000T0000Z-070429T1000Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
251 AM PDT SUN APR 29 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ALLOWED THE
DENSE FOG ADVISORY FOR THE VENTURA COUNTY COAST TO EXPIRE. LOCAL
DENSE FOG COULD STILL DEVELOP THIS MORNING AS THE MARINE LAYER
DEPTH INCREASES.

$$

CAZ039-291100-
/O.EXP.KLOX.FG.Y.0009.000000T0000Z-070429T1000Z/
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY SOUTH COAST-
251 AM PDT SUN APR 29 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ALLOWED THE
DENSE FOG ADVISORY FOR THE SANTA BARBARA COUNTY SOUTH COAST TO
EXPIRE. LOCAL DENSE FOG COULD STILL DEVELOP THIS MORNING AS THE
MARINE LAYER DEPTH INCREASES.

$$

CAZ034-035-291600-
/O.CON.KLOX.FG.Y.0009.000000T0000Z-070429T1600Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
251 AM PDT SUN APR 29 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS
MORNING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS CONTINUED A
DENSE FOG ADVISORY FOR THE SAN LUIS OBISPO AND SANTA BARBARA
COUNTY CENTRAL COASTS. THIS ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM
PDT THIS MORNING.

AREAS OF DENSE FOG WILL CONTINUE OVER THE CENTRAL COAST THIS
MORNING. OBSERVATIONS FROM THE CENTRAL COAST INDICATES DENSE FOG
CONTINUING ALONG THE CENTRAL COAST WITH VISIBILITIES ONE QUARTER
MILE OR LESS IN THE AREAS AROUND SANTA MARIA AND SAN LUIS OBISPO.
VISIBILITIES ARE EXPECTED IMPROVE LATER THIS MORNING.

A DENSE FOG ADVISORY MEANS VISIBILITY WILL FREQUENTLY BE REDUCED TO
ONE QUARTER MILE OR LESS. IF DRIVING...SLOW DOWN...USE YOUR
HEADLIGHTS...AND LEAVE PLENTY OF DISTANCE AHEAD OF YOU. FOG CAN ALSO
MAKE ROAD SURFACES SLICK SO AVOID USING EXCESSIVE SPEED.

$$

HALL
